title: "Majority of people at odds with tech billionaires over artificial intelligence"
excerpt: "Earlier polling by the AIPI found that more than 80% of respondents surveyed don't trust tech executives to regulate themselves when it comes to AI; 82% of people want to slow down the development of the technology, while 83% believe AI could accidentally cause a catastrophic incident."
